projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: Our GCM push dispatcher supports FCM (Firebase Cloud Messaging) which needs to be updated  and mentioned in the documentation
fields.summary: Update GCM documentation to mention FCM (Firebase Cloud Messaging)

comments.body: I have started working on the issue.

The following Appcelerator documentation topics have been updated to include and mention FCM (Firebase Cloud Messaging):

https://wiki.appcelerator.org/display/guides2/Mobile+Backend+Services+FAQ 
https://wiki.appcelerator.org/display/guides2/Push+Notifications 
https://wiki.appcelerator.org/display/guides2/Configuring+push+services
https://wiki.appcelerator.org/display/guides2/Managing+Mobile+Backend+Services+Datasources
https://wiki.appcelerator.org/display/guides2/Sending+and+Scheduling+Push+Notifications
https://wiki.appcelerator.org/display/guides2/Titanium+SDK+and+Mobile+Backend+Services
https://wiki.appcelerator.org/display/guides2/Subscribing+to+push+notifications 
https://wiki.appcelerator.org/display/guides2/AMPLIFY+Appcelerator+Platform+Services+SDK+for+Android+Mobile+Backend+Services
https://wiki.appcelerator.org/display/guides2/Troubleshooting+Guide

Are there any other Appcelerator topics that need to be updated to FCM?

The following Appcelerator documentation topics have been updated to include and mention FCM (Firebase Cloud Messaging):
